content: {"name": "City Harvest Mobile Market - Bed-Stuy", "alternate_name": "", "description": "LOCATION\nHandball court of the Tompkins Houses on Myrtle Avenue, between Throop and Tompkins Avenues", "email": "", "url": "cityharvest.org/programs/mobile-markets/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "736 Park Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Bedford-Stuyvesant", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6977104, "longitude": -73.94600319999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(866) 444-0244", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will reschedule in case of holiday closures"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Eligible if you are a resident of the Sumner, Tompkins, 303 Vernon or Marcy Houses or Participate in the Sumner Senior Center or a resident in zip code 11206"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Distribution at  handball court of the Tompkins Houses"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requirements/schedule may change in June"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Recommended to arrive before 10am; people begin lining up at 7am"}]}
